---
name: "Map Request"
about: Request adding, removing, or updating a map for an existing mode or rotation
title: "[Map] Short description"
labels: [map]
---

### Map Name
`de_example` or name found when running status in console

### Workshop ID
Paste the numeric ID (if applicable):  
`1234567890`

### Type / Mode
Which mapgroup or mode should it belong to?  
(e.g. `mg_comp`, `mg_course`, `mg_surf`)

### Reason
Why should this map be added or removed?

### Additional Info
- [ ] Tested locally
- [ ] Confirmed playable
- [ ] Matches event style
